About Me

Hello there,

My name is Antonio Sebastián Dromundo Escobedo, and I’m a computer scientist.

Developer, geek, guitarist, and swimmer, I’m passionate about open-source projects and making technology accessible for everyone.

I’m curious about data science and cloud computing, looking to bring the benefits of computer science to non-related fields.

I made a brief incursion to agronomic science. It led me to reflect if tech advances are getting to all the people that need them.

My life project is to make technology a pillar of everyday life in Latin America. Education, science, and well-living for all.

You just have to make it fun.

Education

Universidad Autónoma de México (UNAM)

BSc Computer Science

2018-2023

Established in 1910, UNAM is the largest university in Latin America. It generates extensive researh publications and patents in areas as robotics, computer sciences and physics (among others).

During my studies, I’ve learned strong foundations on algorithms and data structures. I’ve programmed with functional programming acquiring a good notion of robustness and security in programs. I care about code efficiency and algorithm optimization.

I founded a Computer Science Club to share resources and provide help to newer students. It has helped me to develop my teamwork and leading skills.
